document.full_text: china must make mastering cyber-warfare a military priority as the internet becomes the crucial battleground for opinion and intelligence, two military officers said on friday, two days after google revealed hacking attacks that it said came from china.
document.title: china pla officers call internet key battleground
lines_and_colors: china must make mastering cyber-warfare a military priority as the internet becomes the crucial battleground for opinion and intelligence, two military officers said on friday, two days after google revealed hacking attacks that it said came from china.
